metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010190 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: mgetty prior to 1.2.1 is affected by: out-of-bounds read. The impact is:DoS, the program may crash if the memory is not mapped. The component is:putwhitespan() in g3/pbm2g3.c. The attack vector is: Local, the victim mustopen a specially crafted file. The fixed version is: 1.2.1.

criterions.comment: mgetty package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
